actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens Jing, tonifies Qi and nourishes the Blood.
With Shu Di Huang, for chronic weakness and debility.
With Shu Di Huang and Dang Gui, for anemia.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and regulates the menses.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
Powerfully tonifies Yuan Qi, generates Body Fluids and stops thirst.
With Shu Di Huang and Tian Men Dong, for Qi and Yin Deficiency
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, strengthens the sinews and bones, aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood and calms the fetus.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, sedates Fire, moistens the Lungs, nourishes the Kidneys, generates Fluids and resolves Phlegm.
With Mai Men Dong, for a dry cough, thirst and other symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and injured fluids.
With Ren Shen and Shu Di Huang, for debility and a low grade fever due to Yin Deficiency or after a febrile disease.
Nourishes Lung and Stomach Yin and generates Fluids.
Nourishes Jing and Blood, fills the Marrow and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
With Ren Shen, for Qi, Blood and Yin Deficiency.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao and drains Kidney Deficiency Fire.
Tonifies the Kidneys and astringes Jing.
With Ren Shen and Mai Men Dong, for exhaustion of Qi and Yin with shortness of breath, coughing and thirst and spontaneous night sweats with Qi Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys
Boosts Jing
Tonifies Qi
Nourishes the Blood
syndromes: Kidney Yi Deficiency with Jing and Blood deficiency

symptoms: Possibly a history of late menarche
Decreased menses with light colored Blood and no blood clots
Aches and weakness in the waist and legs
Low back and knees weak and aching
Graying or whitening of the hair
Atrophy and weakness of the feet with difficulty walking
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Floating and Empty or Weak
